title: Engineering Excellence
subtitle: About Us
content:
For over 15 years, Floor.DSGN has delivered engineering-grade flooring solutions across Israel. We combine European material systems with precision installation to create floors that perform and inspire.

Floor.DSGN was founded by flooring engineers who saw a gap in the Israeli market: a need for truly technical flooring solutions delivered with architectural sensibility.

Today, we serve industrial facilities, commercial developers, architects, and homeowners who demand performance without compromising aesthetics.

values.title: Technical Excellence
values.description: Every project begins with thorough substrate analysis and system specification. We match the right floor system to your specific environment and performance requirements.
